column5: Stay only 10 minutes away from downtown in the heart of Deco district which is filled with beautiful historic homes in well established neighborhoods. We are located 2 minutes away from Woodlawn Park and Minutes away from Fredricksburg, Babcock, and Medical Center. More attractions include a short 22 minute drive to Six Flags Fiesta Texas or Sea World. We are surrounded by Mom & Pop shops and close to malls. But far enough to offer a very peaceful and quiet home.  We live right upstairs :).
